cluster_classes.class_description: Key physical elements and events from the Hook Man urban legend scene involving a couple in a car, a mysterious noise, and the discovery of a bloody hook on the car door handle.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: the couple becomes increasingly terrified as they hear a scratching sound on the car door, only to discover a bloody hook hanging from the handle

members.entity_description: An ominous scratching noise heard by the couple on the car door in the story.
The door of the couple’s car where the scratching sound is heard.
A blood-covered hook found hanging from the car door handle in the Hook Man story.
The handle of the car door from which the bloody hook is discovered hanging.

cluster_classes.class_description: Core narrative elements of the Hook Man urban legend, including the setting, the warning medium, and the antagonist figure that structure the story’s central scare.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: The tale typically involves a young couple parked in a secluded area when they hear a news report about an escaped criminal with a hook for a hand.

members.entity_description: An isolated location where the young couple parks in the Hook Man story.
A broadcast news message warning about an escaped criminal that the couple hears.
A fugitive offender described in the news report who has a hook for a hand in the Hook Man legend.
A pair of young people featured as protagonists in the Hook Man urban legend scenario.
A metal hook replacing the hand of the escaped criminal in the Hook Man legend.

cluster_classes.class_description: Concepts specifically referring to the Hook Man urban legend, including the legend itself and its internal narrative variations.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: All three refer to the same underlying urban legend (the Hook Man story)... While the specifics of the story may vary...

members.entity_description: A famous modern urban legend about a murderous figure with a hook for a hand, told in many narrative versions worldwide.

members.entity_name: story specifics of the Hook Man legend
members.entity_description: The variable narrative details and plot elements within different versions of the Hook Man urban legend.

args.new_description: All concrete narrative elements that make up the Hook Man urban legend scenes, including the couple, car, setting, warning medium, antagonist, and key props/events such as the scratching sound and bloody hook.
args.justification: Both classes exclusively contain narrative components of the same Hook Man urban legend (settings, props, events, characters) and differ only by an arbitrary split between 'scene' and 'core elements', so they should form a single coherent narrative-elements class.
Assign a coherent upper-level grouping to the merged narrative-elements class, explicitly tying it to the Hook Man urban legend domain.

args.new_description: The Hook Man urban legend as a narrative concept, including the legend itself and the range of its internal narrative variations.
args.justification: Clarify that this class represents the overarching legend concept (not just elements) and group it with the narrative-element class under a shared Hook Man Urban Legend class group.

executed_decisions.justification: Both classes exclusively contain narrative components of the same Hook Man urban legend (settings, props, events, characters) and differ only by an arbitrary split between 'scene' and 'core elements', so they should form a single coherent narrative-elements class.
Assign a coherent upper-level grouping to the merged narrative-elements class, explicitly tying it to the Hook Man urban legend domain.

executed_decisions.new_description: The Hook Man urban legend as a narrative concept, including the legend itself and the range of its internal narrative variations.
executed_decisions.justification: Clarify that this class represents the overarching legend concept (not just elements) and group it with the narrative-element class under a shared Hook Man Urban Legend class group.
